resources.string: please insert your birthday so we can calculate your exact age 🙂
On a Home screen, touch and hold an empty space.\nTap Widgets.\nTouch and hold a widget...
please enter your beautiful name here:

this is your exact age
you are getting closer to the day that you die...😂😂 

you can add widget to your home screen to see this everytime you pick up your phone 😍 or you can uninstall you lazy potato 😒
